resources.string: Hubs are the central base stations of the SmartGuard suite.\nTo register a hub, please do the following:
Insert an active SIM card that can send/receive SMS (with sufficient credit) into the Hub
Power on the Hub & let it boot
Add the Phone No. of the siM card in the Hub below. and press the \'Add Hub button
This is a short name you can assign to this specific Hub to let you know where this device is currently locate.
Press and Hold 2s to send an SOS
This cannot be undone. Once the device has been formatted, all connected sensors will be disconnected.
This can take up to few minutes. You\'ll be notified via SMS once the device has been formatted.
Get Started by adding devices here
Add others to your hubs easily
Get help whenever you need it whenever you need it
The SmartGuard suite is controlled from the central \'Hub. Be sure to use an active SIM card to communicate with the Hub!
Adding a new device to expand your home security is as easy as 3 taps!
Help is available at every single step, just tap the \'Help\' icon on the top right to get quick answers!
Have the smart guard hub automatically notify other people when any sensor is triggered!
Registered users will be notified via SMS and/or\nPhone call along with your number when the\nSmartHub alarm is triggered.
Registered users can manually trigger the SmartHub\nAlarm through the App.
